Name: Sumit Chourasia
AboutMe:
Currently I am working with UST Global as a Software Developer. My current role includes Software Development and Backend Services implementation.

I am a qualified B.Tech (Computer Science and Engineering) from Institute of Technology, Guru Ghasidas Vishwavidyalaya (A Central University), Bilaspur with 83.8% Aggregate. I possess hands-on experience, as well as familiarity with coding and computer applications. Possess rich domain knowledge with comprehensive understanding of programming on C, C#, Java, Algorithms.

Coding is my passion and that motivates me to improve my skill set. I am always enticed by coding and hence always ready to code. Challenging problems help me learn and get better at the art of problem solving. Being a creative team player, I have a sound knowledge of Data Structures(Array, Stack, Queue, Linked List, Binary Tree, BST, AVL Tree, Binary indexed Tree, Segment Tree, Heap, Dictionaries) and Algorithms(Searching, Sorting, Hashing, Dynamic Programming, Pattern Matching) and have good problem solving skills.

With good communication and interpersonal , my self confidence, innovative approach and quick adaptability to changing processes have been my biggest assets.
